```{r}
gc_primates <- read.delim('/lab/solexa_page/hannah/supp_info/tables/GC_primates.csv', sep = ',')
gene_pairs <- read.delim("/lab/solexa_page/hannah/220516_mpra/msa/long_alignments/g_p.txt") 

names(gene_pairs) <- c('gene', 'pair', 'type_of_gene', 'direction') 

gc_prim <- merge(gc_primates, gene_pairs, by = "gene")
gc_prim$m_header <- paste0(gc_prim$type_of_gene,"_", gc_prim$region)

```

```{r}
ggplot(gc_prim %>% filter(region == "promoter"), aes(x=human, y=species)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  facet_grid(comparison ~ m_header, scales = "free") + 
  theme_pubr() + 
  geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 1, linetype = "dashed")  
 

```
